title: On the Convergence of Multi-Server Federated Learning With Overlapping Area
summaries: in the decentralized FL framework, [1] __enable indirect model sharing among servers__ by allowing clients in overlapping areas to update local models based on average of all accessible servers' models, [2] __prove the convergence on non-iid datasets for general non-convex settings__
bibtex: @article{qu2022convergence, title={On the convergence of multi-server federated learning with overlapping area}, author={Qu, Zhe and Li, Xingyu and Xu, Jie and Tang, Bo and Lu, Zhuo and Liu, Yao}, journal={IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing}, volume={22}, number={11}, pages={6647--6662}, year={2022}, publisher={IEEE}}
